newsitem.title: ANGOLA: Port conditions update - Angola - Lloyds Shipping.
newsitem.headline: Port conditions update - Angola - Lloyds Shipping.

text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --

ANGOLA, March 24 - Luanda - Public sector workers, which included ministries of commerce, health and finance, taking industrial action in one or two day strikes. This has started to effect customs in the port area, but only appears so far to be carried out in Luanda.
